channel.title: How do i create my own ::commands list on server or make commands work?
channel.description: please help me im trying to find out how to add or make commands on my server for them to work or to add on another command ... i want everyone to be able to do ::command and it will show all of player commands and mod, admin , owner commands? can anyone please help./

item.title: How do i create my own ::commands list on server or make commands work?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“partykid, post:2, topic:395058”] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126(Config.SERVER_NAME + " - Commands", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("::changepassword ~ to change password", 8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::yell ~ To speak out to the whole server!", 8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::players ~ To see how many players are on", 8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::command name ~ Description", 8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::command name ~ Description", 8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::command name ~ Description", 8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::command name ~ Description", 8152); c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); }
basic layout for one :)[/quote]

Very inefficient though.

private static final String[] COMMAND_LIST = new String[] {
    "bank", "getpos"
}

Then you just add a command

if (command.equals("commands")) {
    for (String s : COMMAND_LIST) {
        Packet packet = new SendMessagePacket(s);
        client.sendPacket(packet);
    }
}

Note, that’s just an example of how you could do it. You would of course have to edit it for your specific configuration.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i create my own ::commands list on server or make commands work?

item.title: How do i create my own ::commands list on server or make commands work?
item.dc:creator: @partykid partykid
item.description:
@partykid wrote:

		    if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) {
			c.getPA().sendFrame126(Config.SERVER_NAME + " - Commands",
					8144);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("::changepassword ~ to change password", 8145);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::yell ~ To speak out to the whole server!", 8147);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::players ~ To see how many players are on", 8148);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::command name ~ Description", 8149);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::command name ~ Description", 8150);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::command name ~ Description", 8151);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126 ("::command name ~ Description", 8152);
			c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
			c.flushOutStream();
		}

basic layout for one
